person.persName: Ben Lee Hardin (Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky)

body.p: Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1863. Kentucky native. Son of Parker C. Hardin. Resident of Adair County, Kentucky, in 1850.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 1, p. 1; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 1; Find A Grave, "Benjamin Lee ‘Ben’ Hardin (1844-1925)," Memorial #101249001, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=101249001 (accessed May 25, 2017); KYR-0001-029-0552.
